Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 14 April 2025
Tonight: Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in most parts of the island. Fairly heavy
falls of about 75mm are likely at some places in Central, Sabaragamuwa and Uva provinces.

Southern and Uva provinces and in Ampara and Batticaloa districts during the afternoon or night. Showers
or thundershowers may occur at a few places elsewhere in the island during the afternoon or night.
